name: grid.less
body:
This framework lets you configure your personal grid. Getting Started --------------- 1. Install [Less](http://lesscss.org/) (`npm install -g less`). 2. Download [grid.less](https://raw.github.com/pvorb/grid.less/master/grid.less). 3. Start your new less stylesheet (e.g. `style.less`) and specify the basic variables. ``` less @import 'grid.less'; @cols: 12; @colwidth: 60px; @colspace: 20px; ``` 4. Compile with `lessc style.less > style.css`. 5. Set up you basic HTML document (e.g. `index.html`). ``` html grid.less test
